high_descs: Turn to the left, and then the left again and face the short far side of the white dresser.
Facing the white dressing, turn on the lamp.
Pick up the pen from the right side of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp and pick up a pen.

high_descs: Turn left and walk around the side of the bed, then turn right and walk to the mirror.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser to the right.
Pick up the pen on the counter.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk to the pictures on the wall to your right, turn left and go towards the door, turn to your right just passed the dresser and go to the left end of the dresser.
Turn on the lamp in the corner of the dresser.
Pick up the pen in front of the lamp, on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pen on the dresser.
